Body: Description: Please find the below snips for your reference this is for Mac user, even post addition of certificate and reboot done its not reflecting as trusted on the portal.

Description Updated: The macOS endpoints were not showing as "Trusted" under the column "Certificate added to Keychain/Store" in our very first session we established that this is not an issue or malfunction of our product but rather that the conditions were not met for these endpoints to be shown as "Trusted" - This applies for both Windows and macOS endpoints which both share this status under the same column.
We have discussed this topic more than once in our previous remote sessions, customer confirmed in email that the endpoints show as "Trusted" after the conditions are met with the proper configurations outlined in the guide "How to ensure prerequisites for macOS endpoints are in place2.pdf" we consider this subject solved.
